LanguageData.VFEM2_Inebriated.stages.0.label: навеселе
LanguageData.VFEM2_Inebriated.stages.0.description: I just feel a bit more relaxed after that drink. That's good.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Inebriated.stages.1.label: опьянение
LanguageData.VFEM2_Inebriated.stages.1.description: I'm a bit wobbly! And this is quite enjoyable.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Inebriated.stages.2.label: под градусом
LanguageData.VFEM2_Inebriated.stages.2.description: I feel so uninhibited and unafraid! This is a great time!
LanguageData.VFEM2_Inebriated.stages.3.label: в стельку
